executor::executor (6 of 6 overloads)

Allocator-aware constructor to create a polymorphic wrapper for the specified executor. 

template<
    typename Executor,
    typename Allocator>
executor(
    allocator_arg_t ,
    const Allocator & a,
    Executor e);
